title: Facebook Alert: Disable This New Feature! #privacy #facebook #security
description:
Facebook is beginning to roll our Link History, a new feature that should be a bold reminder Facebook/Meta is tracking you, despite some other notoriously iffy companies moving in the opposite direction.
